CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[dsh_GetMdxFilters]
@hierarchyId INT
AS BEGIN
-- 7 1-й уровень иерархии Contact_FirstLevel -- 14 2-й уровень иерархии Contact_SecondLevel -- 15 3-й уровень иерархии Contact_ThirdLevel IF @hierarchyId = 7 or @hierarchyId = 14 or @hierarchyId = 15 BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT fl.id AS id, fl.name, @hierarchyId as hierarchyId FROM ent_FirstLevels fl END
-- 8 Основной менеджер Contact_MainManager ELSE IF @hierarchyId = 8 BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT mm.id AS id, mm.name, @hierarchyId as hierarchyId FROM ent_MainManagers as mm END
-- 9 Менеджер Contact_Manager ELSE IF @hierarchyId = 9 BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT e.id AS id, e.name, @hierarchyId as hierarchyId FROM ent_Employe as e END
-- 10 Регион Contact_Region ELSE IF @hierarchyId = 10 BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT r.id AS id, r.name, @hierarchyId as hierarchyId FROM ent_Regions as r END
-- 13 Группа контакта Contact_Group ELSE IF @hierarchyId = 13 BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT cg.id AS id, cg.name, @hierarchyId as hierarchyId FROM ent_ContactGroups as cg END
END
